original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Elah, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
korean_text: 엘라의 남은 사적과 행한 모든 일은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Elah
are they not written in the book
of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
